    "location": "Park at night",
    "visual_description": "A person is walking a dog in a park at night. The lighting is dim, with streetlights casting shadows. Trees are visible in the background. The person is wearing a dark shirt and shorts.",
    "characters": ["Man 1", "Dog"],
    "dialogue": "אה, אה, אה, אה,",
    "mood_tone": "Casual, ambient",
    "keywords": ["park", "night", "dog", "walking", "outdoors"],
    "frame_path": "uploads/session_id/frames/frame_0001_t0.0s.jpg"
  },
  {
    "scene_number": 2,
    "timestamp": "00:13 - 00:32",
    "time_sec": 13.0,
    "location": "Park at night",
    "visual_description": "A man is walking and talking on his phone in a park at night. He is wearing a red t-shirt and shorts. The background shows trees and dim lighting. He appears to be mid-conversation.",
    "characters": ["יצקו"],
    "dialogue": "כן. היי, עצקו, מה קורה אחי? ככה הרבה זמן לחזורה. כן, סורי, אולי, עם דברים על הראש. מה, על מרצי תלדבר? מה, אתה עם הכלבה עכשיו? כן, אני מרדן, הטיול על לי, את יודעת. על מרצי תלדבר? עצקו?",
    "mood_tone": "Conversational, slightly apologetic",
    "keywords": ["park", "night", "phone call", "dog", "friends", "apology"],
    "frame_path": "uploads/session_id/frames/frame_0002_t13.0s.jpg"
  },
  {
    "scene_number": 3,
    "timestamp": "00:32 - 01:00",
    "time_sec": 32.0,
    "location": "Park at night",
    "visual_description": "A man is sitting down, looking thoughtful and slightly frustrated while on his phone. He is wearing a red t-shirt and shorts. The setting is still a park at night with ambient lighting.",
    "characters": ["יצקו"],
    "dialogue": "יצקו התנתקנו, אה... דבר איתי, ביי. אתה אה, זם, אני לא מדברת אותו. למה, מה קנה? אה, נשבר לי, אחי. כל פשוט נתקשר אליו, אומרים, נחזור אליך בלילה. למה? למה? כן, טוב, לא רק שום תהיל עם הכלבה שלו, בלילה. אתה קולט, אני חבר כלבה. אתה מה? חבר כלבה, נו.",
